articles.author: Feroz Khan
articles.title: Corey Anderson, Harmeet Singh Star as USA Stun Bangladesh by 5 Wickets Ahead of T20 World Cup - News18
articles.description: Bangladesh are ranked ninth in the world T20 rankings while the USA are placed 19th, below Nepal and Oman, but the Americans were more than a match for their more experienced opponents.
articles.content:
The United States pulled off a shock five-wicket win over Bangladesh in a Twenty20 International in Houston on Tuesday giving the Americans a timely boost ahead of next months T20 World Cup.
The USA… [+2160 chars]
